definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: named after [[חִיחָא]] as an officer of Nethinim Ne 11:21; v. om. B; LXXL & Codd. Gesfa; name not elsewhere in OT, not even ‖ 1Ch 9; possibly corrupted from [[חֲשֻׂפָא]] Ne 7:46 (following [[חִחָא]]; in ‖ Ezr 2:43 [[חֲשׁוּפָא]], [[חִיחָא]]), LXX (Asfa (B; Codd. Aseifa, etc.); cf. BeRy.
